ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] re: Fascinating article
ygData.msgSnippet: Most of my alts are female (wanna make something of it?), and I have to agree with Wendy.  Not only are there a lot of players in this game who don t know how
ygData.messageBody:
Most of my alts are female (wanna make something of it?), and I have to agree with Wendy. Not only are
there a lot of players in this game who don't know how to relate to women, there are some players in this
game I really think should be locked up for the safety of their female townsfolk.

Kenross Cantoforjado, Virtuoso (I'm thinking retired?) of Innoruuk



"Cranfill, Wendy" wrote:

> A-freaking-men!
>
> For an even more frightening study, do a survey of the types of remarks real
> women get in tells while playing this game. While I know there are any
> number of "normal" men playing this game (at least I hope).. there is a
> disturbing number of men with absolutely NO idea of how to interact socially
> with women. Frightening. And yes, I am prepared for the flames from the
> overgeneralized, stereotyping remark I have just made. Someday though, I
> will have to compile my screenshots for some amusement!
>
> Halana/Tani
